TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 捕获并提供有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。

span.span: Captures and presents execution details about a Web request.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此类将消息附加到特定的跟踪类别。You can use this class to append messages to specific trace categories. 例如，如果要为应用程序创建 类的实例，则可以在呈现过程中包含跟踪消息 "开始呈现"，并在事件处理程序过程中包含 "引发 OnChange 事件"。For example, if you are creating an instance of the class for your application, you might include the trace message "Starting To Render" in a rendering procedure, and "Raising OnChange Event" in an event handler procedure. 你还可以使用 类，在执行自定义处理的请求执行结束时获取一组跟踪记录。You can also use the class to obtain a set of trace records at the end of request execution for custom processing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386420(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386420(v=vs.100)). 若要启用跟踪，请将[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中的 `Trace` 属性或 属性设置为 `true`。To enable tracing, set the `Trace` attribute in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive or the property to `true`. 启用跟踪后，除了显示用户提供的跟踪内容外， 类还自动包括每个请求的性能数据、控制树结构信息和状态管理内容。When tracing is enabled, in addition to showing user-provided trace content, the class automatically includes performance data, control-tree structure information, and state management content for every request.

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置用来指示是否启用对当前 Web 请求的跟踪的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tracing is enabled for the current Web request.

value.span: 如果已启用跟踪，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if tracing is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此标志来检查页面或应用程序是否应在将任何内容写入跟踪日志之前输出跟踪信息。Use this flag to check whether your page or application should output tracing information before it writes anything to the trace log. 属性的值取决于 `system.web` 配置部分的子节中的设置以及指令的 `trace` 特性的值。The value of the property depends on the settings in the subsection of the `system.web` configuration section and the value of the `trace` attribute of the directive. 在页面指令中设置的跟踪选项优先于在配置文件中设置的选项。The tracing option set in the page directive takes precedence over the option set in the configuration file. 以编程方式设置 值优先于页面指令属性和配置设置。Setting the value programmatically takes precedence over both the page directive attribute and the configuration setting. > [!NOTE] > 如果将整个应用程序的 属性设置为 `true`，则必须将此属性显式设置为应用程序中您不希望显示其跟踪信息的任何页面的 `false`。If you set the property to `true` for an entire application, you must explicitly set this property to `false` for any page in the application for which you do not want tracing information displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定是否为页面启用了跟踪。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether tracing is enabled for a page. 此代码循环访问数据集中的行，并为该数据集中的每一行编写跟踪语句。The code iterates through the rows in a dataset, writing trace statements for each row in that dataset. [!code-csharp[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Custom Event TraceFinished As TraceContextEventHandler

member this.TraceFinished : System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler

summary.span: 由 对象引发，用于在收集完所有请求信息后公开跟踪消息。

span.span: Raised by the object to expose trace messages after all request information is gathered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件是在处理 HTTP 请求的 `EndRequest` 阶段引发的。The event is raised during the `EndRequest` stage of HTTP request processing. 收集所有请求信息后，它由 对象引发，以向注册 委托公开 消息的集合。It is raised by a object after all request information is gathered, to expose the collection of messages to registered delegates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册 来处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a to handle the event. 在此示例中，委托循环访问跟踪消息并将它们写入响应流;但是，您可以将相同的信息写入数据库或分析工具使用者。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them to the response stream; however, you could write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪消息输出到请求浏览器应遵循的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorted order in which trace messages should be output to a requesting browser.
One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认为配置文件的 节中 特性指定的设置（该设置的默认值为 ）。

span.span: The default is the setting specified by the attribute in the section of a configuration file, whose default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪消息可以按它们处理的顺序进行排序，也可以按用户定义的类别按字母顺序排序。Trace messages can be sorted in the order they were processed, or alphabetically by user-defined category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何按分配给语句的类别的字母顺序对页面跟踪语句进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how you can sort a page's trace statements alphabetically by the categories that you have assigned to the statements. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 所选的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.
ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log.

summary.span: 与 不同，所有警告在日志中均显示为红色文本。

span.span: Unlike , all warnings appear in the log as red text.

summary.span: 所有警告在日志中均显示为红色文本。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用 方法时，都会向 消息集合添加一个 的跟踪消息，当你处理 事件时，该消息是可访问的。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 添加消息，其 属性设置为 "`true`，其 属性设置为" `null`"。The message is added with its property set to `true` and its property set to `null`.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志，包括用户定义的所有类别、跟踪消息和错误消息。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log, including any user-defined categories, trace messages, and error information.

summary.span: 所有警告在日志中均显示为红色文本。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用 方法时，都会向 消息集合添加一个 的跟踪消息，当你处理 事件时，该消息是可访问的。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 添加消息，其 属性设置为 "`true`"， 属性设置为 `errorInfo` 参数传递的对象。The message is added with its property set to `true`, and the property is set to the object passed by the `errorInfo` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用 方法将错误跟踪消息写入跟踪日志。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此示例中，将不同的异常视为错误和警告。In this example, different exceptions are traced as errors and warnings. 当页面引发 时，它会使用 方法写入一条警告消息。When the page throws an , it writes a warning message using the method. 当页面引发 时，它会使用 方法写入一条错误消息。When the page throws an , it writes an error message using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用 方法时，都会向 消息集合添加一个 的跟踪消息，当你处理 事件时，该消息是可访问的。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 添加消息，其 属性设置为 "`false`，其 属性设置为" `null`"。The message is added with its property set to `false` and its property set to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用 方法将错误跟踪消息写入跟踪日志。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此示例中，委托循环访问跟踪消息，并将它们写入 HTML 表;但是，您可以将相同的信息写入数据库或分析工具使用者。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them as an HTML table; however, you can write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer.
